name: Spectral Filter
description:
The technician before you was unable to process the body, and failed to report the issue for nearly 17 hours. As a result, the site has become increasingly hazardous. Find the filter they left behind and use it to process the deceased.

You are the only person expected to be present. Avoid anything that suggests otherwise. 

Spectral Filter is a short horror game developed by Austin Schaeffer over the span of about 2 months with an original soundtrack by Cyrus Byrd. This was made for fun in my free time so no technical support can be provided as I will be busy working on Compound Fracture.

Download the soundtrack here.

Content warning: Contains flashing lights and mild but easily avoidable jumpscares.
